thread.title: David Walker

author: David Walker
title: David Walker
text: Savalas Lindsey contacted us within 30 minutes of choosing Smart Grout on Home Advisor. We were able to set an immediate appointment for the next day. Our project was to repair our chipped and incorrectly seamed granite kitchen counters. Lindsey is professional, ethical, courteous, flexible, listens and understands what his customer needs. My wife and I would highly recommend Smart Grout for any stone restoration project you may have.
